alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Custer and northeastern Fall River Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 437 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Buffalo Gap, or 9 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo Gap around 450 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Maverick Junction and Oral. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
